title: Cerebrum
overview: Psychiatrist Henri Lacombe heads the National Institute of Mental Health. Day after day, his mission is to ease the suffering of his patients. His wife, Anne Beaulieu, is a consultant psychologist in a private clinic. Both make up the ups and downs of everyday family life with their two children, Marine and William. Henri's world changes the day Anne does not show up at the restaurant where they have to meet. What happened to her?
